reference.title: Import Keystore (during package export) dialog
reference.shortdesc: Allows you to select a keystore that isn't known to the Signing and Keys view for use during the package export process.

section.p: This dialog is displayed when you click Use existing in the Export Android Package Files dialog while exporting an Android package using MOTODEV Studio's export wizard.

strow.stentry: Path to the keystore file to be used.
List of keystore types (JKS, JCEKS, or PCKS12). The keystore being used must be one of the listed types, and you must identify the keystore's type using this list.
The password, specified when the keystore was created, that protects this keystore. You must supply this password.

Select this option if you want MOTODEV Studio to automatically supply the password when you add keys to this keystore or delete keys within this keystore. Leave this option unselected if you want MOTODEV Studio to prompt for the password for each operation.

stentry.uicontrol: Also import this to Signing and Keys view

strow.stentry: Indicates that this keystore should also be added to the Signing and Keys view, for subsequent easy access.
